text: Andrew Ferguson Neil (born 21 May 1949) is a Scottish conservative journalist and broadcaster. He was (until until 13 September 2021) the chairman of the television news channel GB News, which started in 2021. He used to work for the BBC. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish television presenters Category:Scottish journalists Category:Political commentators Category:Conservative Party (UK) people Category:Writers from Paisley, Renfrewshire
title: Andrew Neil
